Kubescope

Kubernetes learning support tool

View the Project on GitHub hizeph/kubescope

02 - Deployment Creation

  1. Create a Deployment named kubescope, with 2 replicas, listening on port 80, using image ghcr.io/cabernardi/kubescope, on Namespace kubescope

  2. [Optional] Create a Service named kubescope of type ClusterIP, on Namespace kubescope [Ref]

  3. Port-forward the Deployment (or Service) port 80 to local port 8000 [Ref]

  4. Access http://localhost:8000/health

Solution
